author: mor
msg: Added an option to add a new shipping address from Order detail page. New shipping address cannot be added for orders that are completed as well as canceled.
Applied patch from Anurag Singh Senger, part of OFBIZ-2478 (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-2478)
